member.name: T:RBCC.Automation.Data.ParameterCurve`2
member.summary: ParameterCurve of X and Y values
member.typeparam: The unit specifying the instance of this curve x-axis type.
The unit specifying the instance of this curve y-axis type.

example.code: ParameterCurve < Time, Length > DistanceCurve = new ParameterCurve < Time, Length > { SetName = "Distance Curve", Comment = "Some comment", Value = new Curve < Time, Length > { new Point < Time, Length > { X = new Double < Time > ( 0, Time.Second ), Y = new Double < Length > ( 0, Length.Meter ) }, new Point < Time, Length > { X = new Double < Time > ( 1, Time.Second ), Y = new Double < Length > ( 0.5, Length.Meter ) }, ... } }
